code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';export const signup=async data=>{return await axios.post(`${API_URL}/signup`,data);};export const login=async data=>{return await axios.post(`${API_URL}/login`,data);};export const getProfile=async token=>{return await axios.get(`${API_URL}/profile`,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});};
